snippet: Analysts say that Medicare beneficiaries on average pay about $1 for every $3 in benefits, but for Social Security beneficiaries who retired in 2010, the amount was about even.
lead_paragraph: Analysts say that Medicare beneficiaries on average pay about $1 for every $3 in benefits, but for Social Security beneficiaries who retired in 2010, the amount was about even.

headline.seo: Getting Back More From Medicare, Less From Social Security
headline.main: Getting Back More From Medicare, Less From Social Security
